usmania grill, kv, the food was tasty but the staff here was rude. kv think the staff here may be the same staff that used to be rude at food time. the place a couple of doors over is excellent. my opinion.
usmania grill, sofia, the biryani is really good. the service takes quite long. sofia recommend placing your order before you get there so your order will  be ready. usmania grill looked very clean.

usmania grill, kiran, so happy to find usmania grill ! visited for the first time and have to say was very impressed by the food and the quantity that usmania grill give. there were   of us and kiran ordered the bbq platter for   which was a very good amount of food. kiran ended up taking leftovers home. the meats in the dishes were tender and well seasoned. the bbq platter for   which was a very good amount of food came with chicken tikka  bihari kebobs tandoori chicken and seekh kebobs served on top of biryani rice. kiran were all very satisfied and happy with the service as well. definitely recommend people to come try. you wo not  be disappointed. the only thing people need to do is to turn the heat on higher in usmania grill. kiran were eating with kiran's coats on the whole time !

usmania grill, george, highly recommend ! tried chicken biryani and butter chicken and naan and chicken biryani and butter chicken and naan were delicious and great value for   . looking forward to doing a larger order next time.. !

usmania grill, elizabeth, elizabeth m giving usmania grill   stars because the front staff is not friendly at all. food is great though. price is great. elizabeth own a restaurant and staff is what makes a restaurant. having staff that is incompetent only devalues your food further. get staff that speak english  knows your product and greets customers well. on the signage outside; you have a sign of a drink called falooda but elizabeth asked the waitress and the waitress gave elizabeth a dirty look. elizabeth told the waitress a drink called falooda is  on your a - frame outside and the waitress was confused further. elizabeth gave up on the waitress and asked another waitress and another waitress was even more incompetent and rude. anyways; hope the owners read this and make changes. you have  got a good product.

usmania grill, sadia, the food at usmania grill is delicious especially usmania grill's kebab. best in pickering by far  only reason sadia would not  give usmania grill five stars is because usmania grill's greatest downfall is management. employees here are very nice however usmania grill's management is horrible with food running out frequently at early hours  last minute cancellations and delays in serving. overall very vey disorganized so if you will be eating there be prepared for that great food polite employees however very disorganized.

usmania grill, sheena, came here for dinner and sheena loved usmania grill. the platters are definitely worth your money. also you have to order the naan bread with potato inside cus the naan bread with potato inside cus is  sooo good. the staff is also super nice and can not  get enough of the staff's biryani rice. sheena would definitely come back here for sure. sheena did not  even know usmania grill existed in pickering.

usmania grill, tiffy, tried halwa puri at usmania pickering location today. it was great ! good portion and size of halwa puri. channa was flavourful and comes with paya which was not bad. good local joint for halwa puri guys !

usmania grill, denise, this review is based on several visits. the food has been consistently great and priced well. removed stars for the cleanliness and bad attitude of the staff. denise m here now and just want to get some windex and a rag to clean the front door !  !  ! the staff is never really that nice do not  expect any thank you  or even a smile. denise will  be back because denise like the food  the owner is super nice too.. the food could be a five star if they just fixed a few things. clean the front window it is a customers first impression the staff to be nice to all customers smile say thank you  etc.

usmania grill, d, ordered the meat combo for the meat combo was fantastic and enough for the three of us  with a lot left over. the food was delicious and exactly the right amount of spices. staff is very friendly and professional. will definitely come back again  over and over !

usmania grill, tahira, tahira ordered catering for     people for a graduation party. never again ! tahira did not  ask for any discount got usmania grill's premium package. usmania grill delivered two and a half hour late ! the food was cold ! no time to reheat as guests were already waiting for   hours. had to serve appetizer that was soggy. usmania grill did not  mention that usmania grill's naan would be grocery store bought naan. tahira could have done that. usmania grill skimped out on the amount of bbq usmania grill promised. tahira dealt with zabar and every time tahira called no one was allowed to do anything except zabar. when tahira called zabar  zabar was too busy to talk to us. totally bad experience ! tahira would not recommend usmania grill for catering ever !

jalsa ice cream and bakery, lily, so lily discovered jalsa ice cream and bakery on the way to the car after dinner next door. lily ordered three cupcakes ; one coffee flavored  one cookies and cream and one red velvet as well as a cake pop. three cupcakes were all delicious. the frosting is flavorful and the cake very moist. lily liked one coffee flavored the best but the rest of the  family favored one red velvet but what do the rest of the  family know   ; the best thing about jalsa ice cream and bakery is that jalsa ice cream and bakery are egg free ! my daughter has an egg allergy so this was my daughter's first non vegan  read bland and cardboard tasting cupcake. lily will be back !

jalsa ice cream and bakery, meryl, jalsa ice cream and bakery meryl tried the meetha paan and the meetha paan was delicious. meryl m not a fan of paan  but the meetha paan was irresistible. you should surely try jalsa ice cream and bakery and explore all the different flavors jalsa ice cream and bakery have to offer. whenever meryl crave for a unique flavored ice cream  jalsa ice cream and bakery is going to be meryl's pick !

jalsa ice cream and bakery, kacee, love jalsa ice cream and bakery ! cute little ice cream and dessert spot that is open late  thank you .. ice cream was to die for and looking forward to my cookie... very clean ! very sweet no pun intended  girls working here and do not  tell girls but kacee think the prices are too cheap ! love jalsa ice cream and bakery !

jalsa ice cream and bakery, rachel, jalsa ice cream and bakery is a wonderful place ! great for all ages and all sweet lovers ! it was so peaceful and happy ! the cupcakes were fantastic and ice cream was yummy. how awesome jalsa ice cream and bakery stay open late and staff was so friendly ! will always come here when rachel am in town. a must !

jalsa ice cream and bakery, gemma, moved away from the area six months ago and stopped next door for a pedi at gemma's old salon. when gemma's tech mentioned jalsa ice cream and bakery had changed ownership  gemma decided to give jalsa ice cream and bakery a try since the last place was not  a favorite. gemma m so glad gemma did ! the cupcake was delicious...gobbled up in the car before even leaving the parking lot after thinking gemma would  just have a little taste since the cupcake smelled soooo good ! the gemma have cream looks amazing  next time   and gemma will  report back on hubby  review of the brownie gemma m taking home to allay gemma's brownie guilt ! that is  if the brownie gemma m taking home even makes it home...

jalsa ice cream and bakery, renée, renée came here a few weeks after jalsa ice cream and bakery opened. renée am not a fan. renée got ice cream and cupcakes. renée sampled a few ice cream flavours and a few ice cream flavours were all gritty. the ice cream is not  smooth at all. renée am not a fan of that. the two cupcakes renée got were both very dry  which was unfortunate. renée wo not  be back.
jalsa ice cream and bakery, rajul, the ice cream was not fresh and did not have a good texture.

jalsa ice cream and bakery, meghna, my family was so excited to try the indian flavors at jalsa ice cream and bakery but when meghna got there meghna were so disappointed. the staff was friendly and jalsa ice cream and bakery was nice and clean  but the ice cream was pathetic. the indian flavors were very muted and the ice cream was not very creamy. the ice cream seemed icy and not smooth. meghna had the mango and the mango's flavor was barely present. the malai kulfi was a bit creamier but the malai kulfi came far from close to authentic kulfi. overall  meghna were very disappointed !  !

jalsa ice cream and bakery, amani, such great ice cream -  -  amani got coffee but the fig was great too !  ! the cupcakes looked delicious as well. the customer service was extraordinary; she was patient and very helpful. and to top it all off the seating was awesome. amani got to enjoy the couch area and listen to some great music.

jalsa ice cream and bakery, brian, arrived early to see a movie at pollak cinema and decided to check out jalsa ice cream and bakery. warm and inviting  clean  and comfortable. casandra welcomed us with a cheerful heart  explained the flavors  and invited us to sample those brian were interested in. brian ordered kaju draksh and lightly gingered. brian's girlfriend ordered pineapple coconut and banana nut. brian also shared a coconut vanilla cupcake. s across the board. will be back !

jalsa ice cream and bakery, pepper, jalsa ice cream and bakery offers indian inspired flavored ice creams  regular ice cream cake pops  cup cakes  coffee and more. jalsa ice cream and bakery  a lovely sleek looking cafe with modern rich looking features. jalsa ice cream and bakery offer mostly counter seating and do have two tiny tables. jalsa ice cream and bakery do offer you samples of the ice cream to try. pepper first tried saffron pistachio and the second one lightly ginger seemed better. pepper's husband only sampled what pepper tried and just ordered the carrot halwa ice cream. the ginger ice cream had a texture that was light and very unique. the flavor was intensely ginger and was sort of spicy but refreshing. pepper tried a taste of pepper's husband  carrot halwa flavor ice cream. both of us did not  care for the carrot halwa ice cream mostly because of the greasy texture. the girl working the counter was pleasant and efficient and jalsa ice cream and bakery seemed clean and spotless. pepper's main reason for the two star rating is that pepper was there forty minutes after jalsa ice cream and bakery were open and not one baked good was ready for sale. pepper wanted to bring home some baked goods and pepper live far from here and pepper m not always in this area so pepper doubt pepper will  be back. jalsa ice cream and bakery has potential to be a gem but you have to get there when jalsa ice cream and bakery are ready to be open for business.

jalsa ice cream and bakery, rucha, rucha am so glad jalsa ice cream and bakery exists ! go - to place when rucha m craving indian flavored ice - cream. really loved the kesar pista the kesar pista is  obviously creamy ice - cream but the kesar pista has the perfect kulfi flavor. rucha really enjoyed the meetha paan flavor too the meetha paan flavor is  strong but awesome just what you expect out of a beetle leaf and fennel seeds. the rest were good too  sitaphal malai kulfi  gulkand. not tried the standard flavors or cupcakes. rucha will  give it a   just for the indian flavored ice - cream the indian flavored ice - cream is  that good.

jalsa ice cream and bakery, amy, jalsa ice cream and bakery   jalsa ice cream and bakery serve the traditional popular ice cream flavors and unique indian inspired favors. amy went just a day or two after jalsa ice cream and bakery opened for business. the staff was friendly  welcoming and helpful. amy will definitely go back for more and to try jalsa ice cream and bakery's cupcakes and coffees.

jalsa ice cream and bakery, andrea, andrea have been to jalsa ice cream and bakery  three times and have enjoyed jalsa ice cream and bakery more with each visit. the first time andrea got a chocolate cupcake and a vanilla cupcake. a chocolate cupcake and a vanilla cupcake were very moist and the frosting was fine -  - nothing special. but the second time andrea tried the coffee cupcake and the coffee cupcake was amazing. andrea went back again the same week to get the coffee cupcake again. and now andrea wish andrea had one in my hand this second.

jalsa ice cream and bakery, austen, so  this is the former location of  mind over batter  cake shop. austen was looking for some cupcakes for my wife  birthday and the reviews for mind over batter cake shop were very good. the pictures of the cakes looked great too. when austen arrived and saw it was now jalsa austen was disappointed but since mind over batter  cake shop also had cupcakes austen gave mind over batter  cake shop a try. austen picked up a lemon  vanilla  chocolate chip and toasted coconut for a total of over    . austen do not  know when cupcakes were made but austen could have  thrown cupcakes through a glass window. cupcakes looked great but cupcakes were hard and stale. the frosting was bland and overall austen was very disappointed. my kids would not  even eat cupcakes. when an   and   year old wo not  eat cake you know cake is  bad. austen can not  speak for mind over batter  cake shop's ice cream but mind over batter cake shop need to get out of the cake business. austen wo not  be back.
jalsa ice cream and bakery, ketan, good variety of indian and western flavors. ketan loved meetha pan  a must . chiku and sitafal flavors were not good.

jalsa ice cream and bakery, jeff, great ice cream. loved the indian inspired flavors ! the standard flavors were excellent quality too. service was wonderful staff was very friendly. only negatives are :  poor seating arrangement  for families no customer restroom    jalsa ice cream and bakery serve coffee but no espresso. otherwise  jeff would be   stars !

jalsa ice cream and bakery, sylvia, jalsa ice cream and bakery serves ice cream and few other dessert items like brownie sundaes  cupcakes  etc. sylvia was impressed by the different types of ice cream jalsa ice cream and bakery carried. flavors ranged from the usual to more exotic flavors. sylvia think they are  indian food - inspired ice cream  but sylvia cannot confirm this since sylvia did not  ask and since jalsa ice cream and bakery's website social media is down. sylvia was able to sample a lot of flavors and a lot of flavors were pretty good ! however  a lot of a lot of flavors had freezer burn and did not  seem fresh. sylvia got the falooda ice cream sylvia love falooda  and the falooda ice cream was delicious ! sylvia would go back and get the falooda ice cream again. the facilities the facilities itself had nice aesthetics. the facilities itself was pretty clean and well - maintained. service was mediocre. the young lady working seemed to be in the  scoop and go  mindset. the young lady working gave me the impression that the young lady working did not  know very much about the flavors. sylvia also did not  feel engaged by the young lady working after asking for recommendations. a lot of places have service like this and it is ok. it just means service was average and nothing spectacular.

jalsa ice cream and bakery, rich, basis for my starred ratings  which skews heavily to the food or drink  : star : never again. stars : poor food  poor experience extraordinary measures in order for rich to come back. stars : average  nothing really special  nothing particularly bad. stars : very good  would definitely return. stars : a favorite  one of the best. rich love ice cream. rich have  had amazing ice cream all over the country. see review for sweet republic on shea . rich really  really wanted to truly love sweet republic on shea as much as rich loved the indian - inspired ice cream joint that rich went to in columbus  oh. but sorry to say  rich can not . not quite yet. rich had no problems with the flavors at all. rich ordered the kulfi and saffron. the kulfi and saffron tasted fine  saffron was great  even. the one thing that killed the   or   - star review one of the flavors was over - icy and the other was freezer burned. the texture and consistency were off. off enough to make me concerned if rich would return. but rich will return. hopefully  better texture in the future. and you should go. because the staff is friendly  because the staff have indian inspired flavors  and indian inspired flavors are good to great. looking forward to a review update and a higher rating.

jalsa ice cream and bakery, karen, so long mind over batter  hello jalsa ice cream and bakery ! jalsa ice cream and bakery is kind of like the former store  except kicked up a notch. jalsa ice cream and bakery have cupcakes and cake pops  and an extensive variety of ice cream. about half the flavors are indian inspired with selections such as mango cardamom ginger  and saffron pistachio. the prices were very reasonable for the ice cream and scoops are quite generous. karen sampled a few flavors  saffron pistachio  sapota fruit  ginger  before deciding on the ginger  single scoop. all the samples overall had good flavor but had a grainy texture to all the samples. karen enjoyed the spicy kick of ginger flavor and the spicy kick of ginger flavor was a perfect sweetness. karen's friend asked for a half scoop of black cherry and a half scoop of banana nut and it looked like my friend got a full scoop each when my friend got my friend's cup. my friend said my friend enjoyed the flavor of banana nut especially. cupcakes and cake pops are beautifully decorated. karen will  definitely have to try one next time with another scoop of ice cream.

jalsa ice cream and bakery, joyce, joyce's head said go to the gym but joyce's heart said eat more ice cream... joyce have  been eyeing jalsa ice cream and bakery for a while. jalsa ice cream and bakery took over mind over batter and joyce have  been wanting to poke joyce's head in to see what jalsa ice cream and bakery had to offer. jalsa ice cream and bakery is exactly a mile away from joyce's gym and joyce always see jalsa ice cream and bakery when joyce are  heading to eos. after an incredibly filling dinner today  like joyce seriously thought joyce was gonna explode joyce had contemplated going to the gym but joyce remembered that joyce have  been wanting to try out jalsa ice cream and bakery. so obviously  joyce are  gonna get ice cream instead of working out. jalsa ice cream and bakery carry    flavors and about half flavors are indian inspired. jalsa ice cream and bakery have fig  fennel tastes like you poured lavender essential oil on your tongue cardamom cashew raisin  et cetera. jalsa ice cream and bakery also have your basic flavors like butterscotch and tutti frutti if you are  not as adventurous. joyce's pal linh l. and joyce ended up ordering kelsa pistachio saffron pistachio  and rose ice cream. they were both crazy delicious and refreshing. the ice cream was dense and creamy and even as joyce stood there waiting for my pal linh l. to try a bunch of flavors the ice cream did not  melt in this arizona heat. wow ! all in all  jalsa ice cream and bakery is a cute little ice cream shop with lots to offer. a single scoop ice cream in a cup is   . so feel free to indulge without breaking the bank !
